name: cema-his
description: This project is a basic health information system developed as part of a Software Engineering Intern Task. It allows a doctor (system user) to manage clients and enroll them in various health programs. Built using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js), this application provides a user-friendly interface and a RESTful API for accessing client data.

scripts.postinstall: cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
